fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm auto-upgrade restarts managed services
fields.request_details:
1. On a control or satellite node with systemd management (locks/service.lck present), ensure auto-upgrade is enabled.
2. Run `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates()"` to simulate an auto-upgrade.
3. After the task completes, run `./status.sh` and verify the service status reports active and "Upgrade in progress" is cleared.
4. Open the auto-upgrade log in the Upgrade Report (System â†’ Upgrade Report) and confirm it records `Restarting <service> via systemd restart after upgrade`, then review `logs/startup.log` to ensure the prestart refresh completed without errors.
